title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: During text change with word wrap, StyledText is performing inefficient redraws, resulting in multiple redraws for each visible line.
EB: This should be optimized to perform a maximum of one redraw for each visible line during text change with word wrap.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Enable word wrap in StyledText.
2. Make a text change in StyledText that results in multiple lines being wrapped.
3. Observe that StyledText performs multiple redraws for each visible line instead of optimizing to a maximum of one redraw per visible line.
